title: Flokipepe
author: Flokipepe
content: Hi everyone i present you my coin the Flokipepe #FPP Help us to begin the new pepe coin. Together we can and we are very early todayAddress contract 0xc391365df94d279acced1dba23d3d9cf3d09d5ad

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: Quote from: Flokipepe on May 14, 2023, 09:21:04 AMHi everyone i present you my coin the Flokipepe #FPP Help us to begin the new pepe coin. Together we can and we are very early todayAddress contract 0xc391365df94d279acced1dba23d3d9cf3d09d5adCan you send some to me, I won't mind free tokens. Joke aside what most people failed to realize is that creating a successful meme coin requires a lot of work, the guy that create Pepe tried more than once before he hit it big. The reasons people are creating these Memes is because they feel it is a get-rich-quick thing and it would attract new investors to  dump on, good luck

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Not sure how well you’ll do with it. Pepe was a legendary internet meme that has been around for years, it makes a lot of people laugh with the memes online so there’s a reason that did so well & went viral. Floki is just a copy of SHIB, people tried to jump on the coat tails of SHIB. You’ve put the two memes together, hoping they can go viral. I’m doubtful it’ll gain a lot of buyers but good luck regardless.

comments.author: petulino
comments.body: Quote from: Flokipepe on May 14, 2023, 09:21:04 AMHi everyone i present you my coin the Flokipepe #FPP Help us to begin the new pepe coin. Together we can and we are very early todayAddress contract 0xc391365df94d279acced1dba23d3d9cf3d09d5adI have been involved with the cryptocurrency market for a long time but never invested in meme coins till date,because I have heard from many people that these meme coins are very risky.I have also heard that people have made huge profits in these coins.Those who invest in such coins in the beginning have chances to get huge returns,but here also one thing should be taken care of that one should always invest a small part of one's capital in these coins.Because if the rate of profit here is very high, then the risk of loss also exists here.However, we wish you all the best.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: What kind of garbage is this lol?  Why not call it flokipepedogeshib?  I mean seriously how many of these useless tokens do we need.  Is there anything you plan on doing with this token or just hope that a ton of people buy in so you can dump it on them?  Seriously what's the point?

comments.author: FahriZah
comments.body: I don,t know about flokipepe because i seen at first time from here and i have previously seen floki one coin and pepe another one coin 2 coins both are different but now you told about flokipepe what is new opportunity waiting for us?

comments.body: Quote from: Flokipepe on May 14, 2023, 09:21:04 AMHi everyone i present you my coin the Flokipepe #FPP Help us to begin the new pepe coin. Together we can and we are very early todayAddress contract 0xc391365df94d279acced1dba23d3d9cf3d09d5adThere are so many tokens of this kind circulating, if everyone wants, of course they can develop their own. But it's not a question of developing tokens in smart contracts, but how the tokens continue. Even you are promoting the token without verifying it first. It's too fast, and too hasty you do.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Flokipepe on May 14, 2023, 09:21:04 AMHi everyone i present you my coin the Flokipepe #FPP Help us to begin the new pepe coin. Together we can and we are very early todayAddress contract 0xc391365df94d279acced1dba23d3d9cf3d09d5adMove this to announcements, and while you are on it it's under token announcements as this is not a coin but a token. Also you have a contract and not even a web page or discord. I can create 10 of these kinds of tokens in a minute. In fact i could use agent gpt to create web sites, social media sites and automate the whole thing for several tokens. And what you are offering is a contract you copied with a copy of a meme? Would it be too much to ask more?

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Just another meme coin that's made maybe for just around 5 minutes through a dev that's selling a service about how they're quick in making altcoin of yours.Quote from: FahriZah on May 14, 2023, 04:58:56 PMI don,t know about flokipepe because i seen at first time from here and i have previously seen floki one coin and pepe another one coin 2 coins both are different but now you told about flokipepe what is new opportunity waiting for us?You don't have to know about it. It's an obvious meme coin and the name of it was taken through floki and pepe coin. They thought that they cannot come up with another name so they just name it with the combined names of those mentioned meme coins.Quote from: o48o on May 14, 2023, 08:23:37 PMMove this to announcements, and while you are on it it's under token announcements as this is not a coin but a token. Also you have a contract and not even a web page or discord. I can create 10 of these kinds of tokens in a minute. In fact i could use agent gpt to create web sites, social media sites and automate the whole thing for several tokens. And what you are offering is a contract you copied with a copy of a meme? Would it be too much to ask more?You don't have to get serious with this project, it's all about what it is and we know that this is the typical shitcoin memecoin that just trying their luck in the market to milk money from investors.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on May 14, 2023, 09:31:35 PMJust another meme coin that's made maybe for just around 5 minutes through a dev that's selling a service about how they're quick in making altcoin of yours.Another shitcoin that took the name of famous and expensive projects and is trying to make money on this nothing. I recently encountered a post on a forum that such memcoins can be created in less than a minute. No wonder that such coins grow like mushrooms after the rain. Their creators are so lazy that they pick up names for their projects from already existing ones

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on May 15, 2023, 06:47:01 AMQuote from: blockman on May 14, 2023, 09:31:35 PMJust another meme coin that's made maybe for just around 5 minutes through a dev that's selling a service about how they're quick in making altcoin of yours.Another shitcoin that took the name of famous and expensive projects and is trying to make money on this nothing. I recently encountered a post on a forum that such memcoins can be created in less than a minute. No wonder that such coins grow like mushrooms after the rain. Their creators are so lazy that they pick up names for their projects from already existing ones Yes, that's true that these shit/meme coins can be made within a few minutes. Those are being offered by some devs that are looking for quick money. I've seen those offers and that's why every time I see a post like this, that's the first thing that I've been thinking of. Like that, they've just bought it from a dev that offers this type of service. As we can see, it's all about everything and even the names are just barely named after those projects that have been successful. Well, this is just one from the many that we're going to see so we should brace ourselves as many of them coming.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on May 15, 2023, 07:23:42 AMQuote from: Xal0lex on May 15, 2023, 06:47:01 AMQuote from: blockman on May 14, 2023, 09:31:35 PMJust another meme coin that's made maybe for just around 5 minutes through a dev that's selling a service about how they're quick in making altcoin of yours.Another shitcoin that took the name of famous and expensive projects and is trying to make money on this nothing. I recently encountered a post on a forum that such memcoins can be created in less than a minute. No wonder that such coins grow like mushrooms after the rain. Their creators are so lazy that they pick up names for their projects from already existing ones Yes, that's true that these shit/meme coins can be made within a few minutes. Those are being offered by some devs that are looking for quick money. I've seen those offers and that's why every time I see a post like this, that's the first thing that I've been thinking of. Like that, they've just bought it from a dev that offers this type of service. As we can see, it's all about everything and even the names are just barely named after those projects that have been successful. Well, this is just one from the many that we're going to see so we should brace ourselves as many of them coming.Along with the fever for these meme coins, which by the way are clogging up the blockchain and raising commissions, there is also fever for creating BRC-20 tokens in various blockchains. First bitcoin, now DOGE. All this puts a shadow over the cryptocurrency industry itself and in the eyes of many people, especially those who are just getting acquainted with this field, it all looks like dabbling and some kind of dubious scam. All these shitty tokens do not bring anything useful to the industry, but only show it from the negative side.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Flokipepe on May 14, 2023, 09:21:04 AMHi everyone i present you my coin the Flokipepe #FPP Help us to begin the new pepe coin. Together we can and we are very early todayAddress contract 0xc391365df94d279acced1dba23d3d9cf3d09d5adThe fact that the coin is another clone of Pepe, of which about 50 pieces have appeared in the last 2 weeks, no one doubts. The only thing that is not clear is what our help should be? I understand that you created the coin, but you don't know what to do next? Obviously, you don't have the money to create a liquidity pool and you expect to be given it here?

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: First of all, this sucks and it's terrible and we are just mocking about at this point and shows the level where memecoins dropped down to, it's really terrible. Secondly no project on this planet could get close to another one by just sharing the address and that's it, this is just a way of asking money.It would have been wiser to open up a topic, saying you are poor, and you are starving, and you need money to survive, and you could show proof of it with some images, and then ask for money, handout, donations basically in charity way. At least that would be honest, if you need money and I mean really need money there are places in the crypto world that can help you, if you do not, then why would anyone give you money anyway.

comments.author: Supianto
comments.body: What's the point of FLOKIPEPE? Are you sure you will be able to attract holders of both "original" coins? And if this is the only way you have to promote your coins then you definitely not gonna make it.
